title: Aamir Khan told Kiran Rao one line from Laapataa Ladies, convincing her: ‘Was struggling as a Laapataa Lady myself’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Kiran Rao remembers how she was like a Laapataa Lady before Aamir Khan told her one line from Laapataa Ladies

Date: Dec 21, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Kiran Rao reflects on her journey as a filmmaker, recounting how Aamir Khan inspired her to take on her latest project, Laapataa Ladies, after a long struggle with finding the right story.

  • Laapataa Ladies is Kiran Rao’s second film after Dhobi Ghat, released 13 years prior.
  • The film received critical acclaim and was India’s entry for the Best International Feature Film at the Oscars.
  • Kiran shared that Aamir’s compelling description of the film inspired her to direct it.
  • She expressed enthusiasm about her next project, stating it won’t take another 13 years to announce.
“That one line was just so compelling that I was like, I want to do this, really badly.” - Kiran Rao

Kiran Rao's story showcases the influence of collaboration in filmmaking and her continued commitment to the industry.
newTitle: Kiran Rao Reflects on Aamir Khan's Influence and Laapataa Ladies

title: Actor Govind Namdev clarifies viral post on dating 30-year-old Shivangi Verma - India Today
summary:
Govind Namdev Clarifies Dating Rumors with Shivangi Verma

Published On: Dec 21, 2024 | Source: India Today

Veteran actor Govind Namdev has addressed rumors claiming he is in a romantic relationship with 30-year-old actress Shivangi Verma, which arose after a viral post.

  • Namdev shared a photo with Verma, leading to speculation about their relationship due to a caption that said, 'Love has neither any age nor any limit.'
  • He later clarified that the post was about their forthcoming film titled 'Gaurishankar Goharganj Wale'.
  • In his clarification, he stated that the storyline involves an old man falling in love with a young actress, and emphasized that he cannot fall in love again.
  • Namdev dedicated a poem to his wife, Sudha, to further dispel any speculations.
“This is not real life, this is reel life... As for me, to fall in love with a young or old person is not possible in this life.”

Govind Namdev, a seasoned actor from the National School of Drama, has been part of numerous films and TV shows, including the recent 'Sam Bahadur'.
newTitle: Govind Namdev Clarifies Dating Rumors with Shivangi Verma

  • The stampede occurred due to overwhelming crowds, highlighting issues of crowd management and safety.
